widgets.html:
<svg
    viewBox="250 35 100 200"
    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
    width="100%"
    height="auto"
    style="max-width: 100%;">
  <rect
       ry="5.3310223"
       y="37.078114"
       x="282.87668"
       height="37.317104"
       width="35.032387"
       id="BatteryTop"
       style="fill:#ffffff;stroke:#b3b3b3;stroke-width:3;stroke-miterlimit:4;stroke-dasharray:none" />
  <rect
       ry="8.3773098"
       y="48.501717"
       x="250.89058"
       height="183.53922"
       width="98.242996"
       id="rect924-7"
       style="fill:#ffffff;stroke:#b3b3b3;stroke-width:3;stroke-miterlimit:4;stroke-dasharray:none" />
  <rect
       ry="6.377718"
       y="57.360992"
       x="258.2504"
       height="165.82066"
       width="83.523376"
       id="BatteryAmount"
       style="fill:#5fba73;fill-opacity:1;stroke:none;stroke-width:2.26311;stroke-miterlimit:4;stroke-dasharray:none;stroke-opacity:1" />
</svg>
widgets.name: StaticHtmlBatteryIndicator
